title.e: Auto Generate Processing Time per Unit

items.key: kieu_hd <> '0' and status = '1' and loai_vt in ('41', '51')

script.text: function active$CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerate(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerate$ResponseComplete)}function close$CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerate(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerate$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function on$CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerate$ResponseComplete(a,c){var d=c.type.Context,e=c.type.Result,b=a.grid;switch(d){case"CheckingBefore":if(0==e[0].Value){a._errorObject=a.getItem("ma_vt");var c=a._language=="v"?"Không có dữ liệu.":"No data found.";$message.show(c,String.format("$find('{0}')._errorObject.focus()",a.get_id()))}else{b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Item=a.getItemValue("ma_vt");b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Group1=a.getItemValue("nh_vt1");b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Group2=a.getItemValue("nh_vt2");b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Group3=a.getItemValue("nh_vt3");b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Date=a.getItemValue("ngay_hl");b._voucher$AutomaticTimePerUnit$Hour=a.getItemValue("cong_suat");a.cancelDialog();b.showForm("CRProductionLeadtimeUnitAutoGenerateForm")}}}

action.text: declare @checkexists bit create table #dmvt(ma_vt char(16), ngay_hl smalldatetime) insert into #dmvt select ma_vt, @ngay_hl from dmvt where loai_vt in (41, 51) and ma_vt like (rtrim(@ma_vt) + '%') and (@nh_vt1 = '' or nh_vt1 = @nh_vt1) and (@nh_vt2 = '' or nh_vt2 = @nh_vt2) and (@nh_vt3 = '' or nh_vt3 = @nh_vt3) if exists (select 1 from #dmvt a where not exists (select b.* from crdmtgsp b where b.ma_vt = a.ma_vt and b.ngay_hl = a.ngay_hl)) set @checkexists = 1 else set @checkexists = 0 drop table #dmvt select @checkexists as checkexists return
